original_title: De la cabeza con Bersuit Vergarabat
overview: De la cabeza con Bersuit Vergarabat (2002) is an album by the band Bersuit Vergarabat Argentina, recorded live in commemoration of the 10 years since the first CD (Y Punto, 1992). In this CD were reflected old songs and two new songs: "Un Pacto" and "Perro Amor Explota".
title: De la cabeza con Bersuit Vergarabat
